name: Camera Cafe': Il gioco
summary: Camera Cafe': Il gioco is a simulation game based on the Omonimous TV series, which takes place inside the company where Paolo Bitta and Luca Nervi work. The game consists of 4 episodes: 2 dedicated to Paolo Bitta and 2 to Luca Nervi. The aim of the game is to succeed in achieving the objectives assigned, taking care of their duties within the company. In practice, it is necessary to find the right balance between the actions that will allow the player to complete his mission and his daily tasks. The game offers the opportunity to interact with the surrounding world by intervening on the objects that are part of it.
